name: Nebula Nuclei
description:
**ITS A LITTLE BUGGY I APOLOGIZE!**

Nebula Nuclei is a space game about a ship that has to move unstable matter away from the galaxy. Created in 48 hours, I set out with a goal to make a game and publish it to Itch; no matter how good or bad the end product is. This is to prepare me for some game jam's I plan on entering this year.
Overall I am happy with the outcome. However, I do feel that the game is a little short and for 48 Hours I could of made the levels and danger's within them a little more complex.

As always, thank you for checking the game out and please tell me what you think of the game below!
